P006791.project_name: Cucuta Water Supply and Sewerage Project

project_abstract.cdata: The Cucuta Water Supply and Sewerage Project will consist of:  (a) construction of water transmission, storage and distribution facilities, and development of a new source of water supply for Cucuta.  It will also involve; (b) expansion of the sewerage system, and construction of a waste water treatment facility to reduce river pollution; and (c) storm drainage improvements.  Finally, the project will provide; (d) extensive technical assistance to EMC for a program of institutional improvement.
